attributes.action: Make the Life sentence mean Life, harsher sentencing for violent crime and more aftercare and support for victims and their families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Families fighting for Justice, I believe covers many different families with different cases, but we all have much in common also.  There is currently no deterrent. Offenders commit murder and other violent crimes, serve some time, are let out and re-offend.  There are many families who have experience of the justice system.  Most are not reassured by it.  There is no punishment.  The focus should be on the victim's rights, currently it is the perpertrator the system focuses on. We want rebalance.  Listen to us.
